name: Jumpventure
description:
Overview:

Jumpventure is a game all about air-jumping your way past spikes. Using Q and E, hop you way to victory!

Features:

  • Jumping
  • Pixels
  • Death

Controls:

[Q/E] - Jump left/right

[ESC] - Fullscreen

A Game a Week [Week 12]:

This game is my twelvth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang) or on my website (pixelmancer.io). Stay tuned!
